text:
There's a first time for everything.
And Bella Thorne made sure to document a rite of passage as she shared images of her first bikini wax.
The 19-year-old took to Snapchat on Tuesday to share footage from the beauty salon, where she was getting a rather painful - and graphic - waxing.
In the video, Bella can be seen wearing a green fuzzy jacket, a black T-shirt - and not much else.
Ouch: Bella Thorne took to Snapchat to share footage of her first bikini waxing with fans on Tuesday
Her back is to the camera and she is sitting on a white towel, which has been laid out on a massage table.
In her right hand are a pair of scissors, and she appears to be trimming her nether regions.
An aesthetician is later seen giving the Famous In Love actress a bikini waxing, as Bella cries out in pain.
Only a red scribbling - which the former Disney star later added - conceals Bella's private parts.

It appeared to have been a day full of beauty treatments for the outrageous actress.
She also shared footage of herself getting her eyebrows waxed, as well as getting a somewhat more relaxing facial.
Bella is notorious for oversharing with her fans, and says she is regularly a target for trolls on social media as a result.

'It sucks, but there have been some times when I was getting so trashed that, yeah, it sucks scrolling through my Twitter feed,' she told Seventeen magazine this month.
But the Blended actress doesn't make any apologies, saying she's simply being herself.
'I think that everybody knows my secret life is very public,' she added. 'I don't think that's ever in question.'
